an2.255-259:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these two qualities that have happiness as their outcome. What two? (255) Non-anger and non-hostility … (256) Non-denigration and non-insolence … (257) Non-envy and non-miserliness … (258) Non-deceitfulness and non-craftiness … (259) Moral shame and moral dread. These are the two qualities that have happiness as their outcome."
